Washington (CNN) Donald Trump says the United States got hosed in the deal it and other world powers struck to halt Iran's nuclear program because "the Persians are always great negotiators."
He blasted President Barack Obama's administration for failing to secure the release of four U.S. citizens who are imprisoned in Iran on espionage charges.
He said the agreement is reminiscent of one the United States struck to secure the release of Army Sgt.
"They are laughing at us back in Iran," he said in an interview with CNN's Dana Bash.
"They get their five guys that they most wanted, anywhere in the world.
